FirstHelloMessage:
Welcome! 🍎

I am a bot that will help you to:
➜ Reduce expenses in stores
➜ Get purchase statistics
➜ Reduce time spent in the store

🏦 In general, I am primarily designed for use in grocery stores, but you can use me anywhere you like

🎫 Happy shopping!
DefaultMessage: 🤳 Воспользуйся ниже приведенными кнопками, чтобы сделать какое-то действие.
SelectShopMessage: 🔍 Please enter the name of the store. We will try to find such a store in our database and provide you with reviews about the store from our users if possible..
FoundedSimilarShop: 🛒 We didn't find a store in our database with the name "{user_shop}". But perhaps you were looking for "{similar_shop}".
NotFoundedShop: 🛒 We didn't find any similar stores with the name "{user_shop}". Don't worry, most likely none of our users have been to this store yet. Be the first!
ErrorWhileShopFinding:
😞 Unfortunately, an error occurred while searching.
Please try again later...
FoundedOpinions:
😊 Here are a few reviews that we found:

{opinions}
NotFoundedOpinions: Unfortunately, we couldn't find any reviews in our database 😞
EnterPriceForProductNegativeError: The price cannot be negative. Please try again 🙅‍♂️
EnterPriceForProductError: Please enter a valid price without any symbols. For example, if the price is 10 dollars, simply enter the number 10. Please try again 🙅‍♂️
EnterPriceForProduct: Enter the price for this item so that we can calculate the total expenses💵
CreateBuyList: 🙏 Enter all the necessary items for purchase separated by commas. 📃 Example: "Milk, Chocolate, Water" 📢 Tips: You can also include additional information in the item name, such as quantity. For example: "Milk, Chocolate(3 pieces), Water(10 liters)" Recommendation: Keep the length of each item name within 20 characters. Note: After sending the message, you will proceed to the next step immediately.
CreateBuyListError: You have tried to enter too many items, which is not allowed. You can try again or go back 🚫
DiscountSetForShop: 💯 Please indicate the percentage of the discount, for example, when using a discount card. 📃 Example: 5.3
DiscountSetForShopError: You entered an incorrect number and an error occurred. Please try again 🚫
StartShoppingMessage:
🎉 Great, the preparation stage is over! 
👉 Once you enter the store - press the button below
ShoppingMessage:
👇 Use the buttons below to:
◉ Mark an item as purchased
◉ Strike out an item
ChangeLanguageMessage: 👅 Choose one of the available languages to change it, and then the bot will start communicating with you in the selected language immediately
ChangeLanguageOkayMessage: 🎉 The language has been successfully changed from {old_language} to {new_language}
OpinionAllowedInformation:
😔 You haven't left a review about this store yet! 
Use the button to leave a review.
MakeRatingMessage: 👍👎 First, choose a rating that would best describe this store
MakingOpinionMessage:
😀 Now you have the opportunity to leave a review about this store. Please note that the maximum character count is 512. 

After sending the message, we will immediately save your review!
MakingOpinionMessageTooBig: The size of your message is too big. The maximum is 512 characters. Please try writing it again 🚫
MakingOpinionMessageSaved: 😀 Thank you very much! We have successfully saved your review. It will greatly help us monitor the quality of services provided by stores.
SelectPeriodForStatisticMessage: 🕛 Choose the period for which you want to receive information about your purchases using the bot
